job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
io173 is partnered with a Management Consulting firm to scale up their Machine Learning Engineering team. Our client's primary focus is on end-to-end development of analytics solutions and their deployment at scale. This role will play a key part in developing and deploying ML models in a production environment.


We are looking for experienced ML Engineers with professional experience interested in the Management Consulting Industry.


Responsibilities:

  • Productionize and deploy ML models.
  • Working closely with data scientists and data engineers to produce and deploy machine learning models.
  • Refactoring code into reusable libraries and tools.


Required Qualifications:

  • Masters Degree in CS or relevant area.
  • 3+ years professional experience in Machine Learning including Linear Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest, Deep Learning. Experience must be outside of Academia and internships or candidates will not be considered.
  • 3+ years in ML Engineer role deploying ML solutions in customer environments.
  • Python programing absolute must- Advanced
  • Strong skills and experience in OOD/SW Engineering concepts including industry best practices.
  • Experience with C, C++, Java or Scala highly preferred.
  • Experience in ML Research is a bonus, consistent experience in production environments is a MUST.


Expectations:

  • Must be located in or willing to relocate to a location commutable to one of our client's major hubs: Boston, Chicago, New York City.
  • Must be willing to travel for work, this will not be a fully remote role.
  • We will not consider C2C candidates for this role, only direct-hire candidates.
  • Candidates will go through multiple technical interviews including testing and coding rounds.


io173.com acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment. By applying for this job you accept the Terms &Condition's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at io173.com
